title: OO 2.4
author: VD
content_html: The latest version of OpenOffice is available for download. I’m still waiting for randomized slides in Impress, but it appears that PDF import is coming in 3.0, scheduled for September, so I’m excited.
content_text:
The latest version of OpenOffice
is available for download
.  I’m still waiting for randomized slides in Impress, but it appears that PDF import is coming in 3.0, scheduled for September, so I’m excited.
